name: array-utils
description: Provides utility methods for common Array operations.

scripts.docs: mkdir src && cp mod.ts src/ && sed -i 's,https://deno.land/x/arrays/mod.ts,array-utils,g' src/mod.ts >> src/mod.ts && ./node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --mode file --out docs src/ && rm -rf src/

author: Damian Perera <damianperera@outlook.com>
